message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1600000.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to make another counteroffer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $1400000?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $1550000, which is the closest I can get to your target price. Please consider this revised offer.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to make another counteroffer. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $1300000?

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1500000. This is the minimum price I'm willing to accept for the product. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.
